name: Juan Adam
bio: Juan is the driving force behind the company’s vision, leading strategic decisions and inspiring innovation across all departments.

name: Dwayne Jhonny
bio: Dwayne built the foundation of the company from the ground up, combining creativity and business acumen to shape its identity and growth.

name: Reed Richy
bio: Reed oversees product development and ensures that every solution aligns with the company’s mission of delivering quality and value.

name: Slimy Hyun
bio: Slimy specializes in health optimization through nutrition, helping clients achieve balance and peak performance through personalized guidance.

name: Alicia Verne
bio: Alicia leads the marketing team with a focus on storytelling, brand consistency, and data-driven growth strategies across all channels.

name: Marcus Lee
bio: Marcus is passionate about crafting scalable digital experiences, overseeing front-end and back-end development with precision and creativity.

name: Sophie Tan
bio: Sophie creates intuitive and visually engaging designs, turning complex concepts into seamless user experiences that delight and inspire.
